I know it's worth at least that much to you, and it would be a great addition to your portfolio. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who's willing to pay my asking price. Let me know your thoughts! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,250,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,250,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
